data.description:
The Ultimate Off-Road Experience In VR - Face the challenges of harsh weather and terrain in fully immersive VR for the first time! Tackle treacherous mud, fierce rivers, rocky paths, and more, to reach your goals.

8 Unique All-Terrain Vehicles—Vary your playstyle by stepping into 8 unique vehicles, each with distinct attributes, including flatbeds, repair modules, log carriers and more!

Explore Immersive Environments - Adventure across vast landscapes in either story or free-play mode and discover new environments through extreme and unpredictable conditions.

Interact With Your Vehicle’s Cockpit - Strategically use your tablet, gear shifter, windshield wipers and more to assist in your missions.

MudRunner VR - Patch #2

Welcome to Patch #2! If you encounter any issues, please send a ticket to our support team at https://support.saber.games. 

1. We have made the low fuel indication signal turn on earlier. It now triggers at ¼ of fuel left in the tank.

2. The behavior for the extended marker has been changed: now, when you click the button to set a custom marker, the extended marker will close, the object marker will be colored turquoise, and the path will be rebuilt.

3. Fixed an issue where using a winch with an unlimited angle could cause a gameplay blocker.

4. Fixed an issue where the player could accidentally engage the reverse gear.

5. Increased the steering wheel speed for 200° and 450° profiles.

6. Changed the position for the winch tree in Mission 5.

7. Reduced the sound for falling stones during MIssion 5.

8. Reduced the amplitude of downward movement of the automatic gate opening lever, for your comfort.

9. Improved the intense moments in the soundtrack.

10. Reduced the duration of the ship’s signals in Mission 10.

11. Various stability improvements.

12. Various visual and gameplay improvements.

Thank you for playing MudRunner VR!

MudRunner VR - Patch #1

Thank you for playing MudRunner VR! If you encounter any issues, please send in a ticket to our support team at https://support.saber.games. 

STABILITY 
- Fixed a crash that was happening when exiting levels 
- Fixed some rendering issues with broken windows 
- Fixed the FPS drops that were occurring on Meta Quest 3  

GAMEPLAY
- Added the ability to save your route in the navigator 
- Fixed a bug with trailer hitching 
- Fixed an issue where fueling was occurring while not interacting with the fueler 
- Fixed an issue related to switching markers after removing a route in the navigator
- Fixed an issue with the which teleport point for non-functional cars in Free Play mode
- Fixed an issue with the fueler teleport point on bridges 
- Fixed an issue with route resetting in the Mission 1, Mission 4, and Mission 10
- Fixed an issue with the position of Angara in Mission 2 
- Fixed an issue related to grabbing the note through the passenger door when the driver is outside the truck while in Free Play mode
- Fixed an issue related to the map marker in Mission 2 
- Changed Mission 7 to be in night mode 

SOUND / AUDIO
- Various sound improvements in all game modes
- New and improved SFX in Mission 2 and Mission 7 
- Fixed an issue with the sound that plays when there is hand collision with a road sign 
- Fixed an issue with the winch hook hit sound 
- Fixed an issue with the engine starter sound 

VISUAL
- Increased the rendering resolution for Quest 3
- Improved the look of grass in all areas 
- New and improved VFX in Mission 2 and Mission 7 
- Improved visuals in Hub area
- Improved the look of water in all areas  
- Improved the look of abandoned vehicles in all areas
- Fixed an issue where the game logo was flickering on startup
- Fixed various ASW artifacts in a number of areas 
- Fixed an issue where two trailer icons were visible in the delivery area while in Free Play mode 
- Fixed an issue with the target truck icon disappearing from the objectives in Mission 11
- Fixed some terrain gaps that were occurring on various maps 
- Fixed some extrusion seams that were occurring on various maps 
- Fixed the light at the end of the tunnel in Town
- Fixed some visual issues where the forest floor meets water on various maps  

LIGHTING
- Improved the lighting in all areas 
- Fixed some lighting popping issues that were occurring on various maps
- Fixed some lighting issues in night maps 
- Fixed some issues with environmental lighting on various maps
